summary:
Christmas is a special holiday celebrated on December 25th each year. It's a time when people remember the birth of Jesus Christ. Many people, both Christians and non-Christians, enjoy this festive season. It's filled with traditions like giving gifts, singing songs, and decorating with Christmas trees and lights.

The story of Jesus' birth is told in the Bible. It describes how Mary and Joseph were offered a stable when there was no room at the inn. Angels announced the birth to shepherds, spreading the good news. Although the exact date is unknown, December 25th was chosen as the official celebration day.
title: Christmas
